content:
I need to retrieve the profiles of Michael Lee and Jeniffer Wong. Can you help me with this?
Begin!

I need to retrieve the Twitter profiles of Michael Lee and Jeniffer Wong. To do this, I will first find their user IDs by searching with their screen names. I will call the function for both users in a single action to get their profiles efficiently. 

My two function calls will be:
1. Get user ID for Michael Lee.
2. Get user ID for Jeniffer Wong.

I'll start with these calls now.

name: user_by_screen_name_for_twitter_v2_v2

I was able to retrieve the profiles of Michael Lee and Jeniffer Wong successfully. Here are some details:

- **Michael Lee:**

  - Created at: Fri Nov 09 00:57:55 +0000 2007
  - Description: Associate Professor @NJIT, computing education researcher, programmer.
  - Followers Count: 120
  - Location: Newark, NJ
  - [Profile URL](https://michael.gidgetlab.com)

- **Jeniffer Wong:**
